title: Vegetable quiche
ingredients: ['SHORTCRUST PASTRY', '150g plain flour', '75g cool butter, diced', 'FILLING', '200g carrots, peeled and diced', '200g broccoli, cut into small florets', '3 eggs', '300ml semi-skimmed milk', '3 tbsp grated Cheddar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprigs of fresh parsley to garnish (optional)']
